Rogers.Township 4, Benton County, Arkansas:
Township 4 is one of thirteen current townships in Benton County, Arkansas, USA. As of the 2010 census, its total population was 25,596.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, Township 4 covers an area of 49.693 square miles (128.70 km2); 49.346 square miles (127.81 km2) of land and 0.347 square miles (0.90 km2) of water.
